name: Ninja Academy Demo
summary: Step into the mesmerizing world of Ninja Academy, where you'll immerse yourself in the ancient art of ninjutsu. Set in a stunning landscape inspired by feudal Japan, you'll train as a ninja apprentice, mastering stealth, agility, and combat. Traverse serene gardens and treacherous mountain passes as you face challenging trials and missions, from intricate obstacle courses to intense battles with rival ninjas. With intuitive VR controls, execute acrobatic maneuvers and unleash devastating combos with...
